function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Robots assisting healthcare workers may fail to prevent the spread of contagious diseases if not properly sanitized or maintained.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare workers getting infected and spreading the disease to patients and other healthcare workers.","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance and sanitization schedules for the robots, along with proper training for healthcare workers in robot interaction.","Technologies":"Advanced sanitization technologies for robots, training programs for healthcare workers.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, other healthcare workers.","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare institutions."},{"Description":"Technological strategies for work from home, distance learning, and surveillance may lead to increased reliance on technology and potential privacy and security risks.","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to cyber threats, data breaches, and privacy violations.","Mitigation":"Implementation of robust cybersecurity measures, privacy policies, and data encryption techniques.","Technologies":"Cybersecurity tools, encryption technologies, privacy protection software.","People":"Individuals working from home, students engaged in distance learning, individuals under surveillance.","Owner":"Employers, educational institutions, government agencies."}]}
